resources.string: You accept the Terms of Use \n by clicking Join Now
How Many Local Consumers You Want To Reach?
When you start a promotion,\n you will see your reports here.
You\'re a few steps away from \n promoting your business to thousands of people around you
Your Promotion Will Be Shown To \n All Consumers Near You
Unable to connect to Server. Check your Internet connection
Please complete the form to Join
Please enter a valid business name
How do I create my promotion?
Can I set a date and time to launch my promotion?
After a promotion is live, can I pause it?
What should be my promotion text?
If there are errors in my message how do I correct that?
How can I reach you for further clarifications?

It's a simple Tap on your mobile phone:

Select the number of consumers you want to see your promotion message 

Enter your promotion message 

Select what you want someone to do when they see your message? 

Tap 'Confirm' & Its Done! 
 
Your promotion message will be scheduled to go-live locally around your business.

Mobile users in your locality/neighborhood who are near your store or business.Typically it will range anywhere between 5 to 15 miles, which we optimize for every promotion.

We work with thousands of mobile APPs and mobile websites to show your promotion.When a mobile user who is near your business location and is using one of those APPs will see your promotion.

We work hard to ensure that your promotion is delivered at the right place, to the right person at the right time.
Yes, when you create the promotion you can set a specific start date and start time for the promotion to go-live.
No, you cannot pause a live promotion.

As a business owner you are the best person to know about your target consumers are and what they are looking for.We can only suggest the following tips:

Keep the promotion message crisp & short 

Make the promotion message local & enticing 

Message can be informational or with call to action 
 
For example: Happy Hour Today between 6 - 10 pm ! 
Sandwich + Coffee $1 
Neighborhood Cafe, 110, Main Drive

Yes, you will be able to see simple reports which tells you: 

How many local consumers saw your promotion message 

How many consumer views still to be viewed
If you have launched your promotion, you cannot stop it. The only way to edit is to cancel your running campaign and then create a new campaign.
The best way to reach us is at : contact@audianz.com. We will respond to your queries as a priority, always.

Promote a Sale, an Offer or a Happy Hour deal, advertise your retail store, your food store, your restaurant, your small business, your boutique, your morning cafe or your garage sale in your neighborhood area - you name it, you do it ! 
 
 
Businesses small or big need to have a way to reach out to its thousands of local mobile users / consumers in a cost effective way - budget big or small ! 
 
 
AudianzLocal by Audianz Network is helping local businesses to reach out to the local mobile users & consumers using Audianz's Local Mobile Advertising solution in few easy steps. Now you can promote your business or your offer on popular mobile apps and mobile websites - and we show those offers only to consumers around your businesses, thus increasing the intent of the consumers to either call you, buy from you or walk in your local store. 
 
 
Audianz Network is a specialized location based mobile advertising company.
Thank You For Promoting with Audianz Platform. You can see your report on clicking See Report below
To reset your password,enter the email address you use to sign in to Audianz Express
